artifacts.summary: Iteration 3 summary: Phases 3-6 completed (BoxGContent/BoxHContent, chain FMCS via Flag/Zorn, F/P witnesses, timeshift N/A)

completion_data.completion_summary: Completed Phases 3-6 of task 925. Built chain-based FMCS infrastructure using Mathlib Flag (maximal chains via Zorn's lemma) over CanonicalMCS preorder. Proved BoxGContent/BoxHContent hierarchy, chain temporal coherence (forward_G, backward_H), pairwise comparability, Zorn existence, forward_F/backward_P witnesses, Diamond persistence, and BoxContent propagation. All proofs sorry-free with zero new axioms. Fixed diamond_persistent_backward using box_to_past derivation. Remaining: Phase 2 (Boneyard cleanup), Phase 7 (chain-bundle BMCS with modal saturation - key sorry elimination target), Phases 8-10.

partial_progress.details: Phases 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 completed. Phase 2 (Boneyard) not started (file reorganization). Phase 7 (Chain-Bundle BMCS) not started (key sorry elimination). Phases 8-10 depend on Phase 7.
